presentationColumns.name: # of Converted Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Opportunities which were created by converting the Leads.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.# of Converted Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Converted Open Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Open Opportunities which were created by converting the Leads.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.# of Converted Open Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Converted Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Won Opportunities which were created by converting the Leads.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.# of Converted Won Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Converted Lost Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Lost Opportunities which were created by converting the Leads.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.# of Converted Lost Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Unconverted Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Opportunities which were not created by converting the Leads.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.# of Unconverted Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Unconverted Closed Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Closed Opportunities which were not created by converting the Leads.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.# of Unconverted Closed Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: # of Unconverted Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The total Won Opportunities which were not created by converting the Leads.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.# of Unconverted Won Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Converted Closed Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: Average Age of Converted Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: sum(Opportunity Close Date  - Opportunity Creation Date)/# of Converted Closed Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.Average Age of Converted Closed Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of Converted Closed Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Converted Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: Average Age of Converted Won Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: sum(Opportunity Close Date  - Opportunity Creation Date)/# of Converted Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.Average Age of Converted Won Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of Converted Won Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Unconverted Closed Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: Average Age of Uncoverted Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: sum(Opportunity Close Date  - Opportunity Creation Date)/# of Unconverted Closed Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.Average Age of Unconverted Closed Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of Unconverted Closed Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Unconverted Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: Average Age of Uncoverted Won Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: sum(Opportunity Close Date  - Opportunity Creation Date)/# of Unconverted Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.Average Age of Unconverted Won Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of Unconverted Won Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Ratio of # of lost Opportunities (unconverted) to Converted Lost Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The ratio of Uncoverted Lost Opportunities to Converted Lost Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: (# of Lost Opportunities - # of Converted Lost Opportunities) /# of Converted Lost Opportunities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.Ratio of # of lost Opportunities (unconverted) to Converted Lost Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: Ratio of # of lost Opportunities (unconverted) to Converted Lost Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Converted Lead Contribution to Opportunities %
presentationColumns.description: The ratio of Converted Opportunities (created from Leads) in all the Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: (#of Converted Opportunities/# of Opportunities)*100
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.Converted Lead Contribution to Opportunities %

presentationColumns.name: Converted Lead Contribution to Won Opportunities %
presentationColumns.description: The ratio of Converted Won Opportunities (created from Leads) in all the Won Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: (#of Converted Won Opportunities/# of Won Opportunities)*100
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.Converted Lead Contribution to Won Opportunities %

localization.localizationKey: Converted Lead Contribution to Won Opportunities %

presentationColumns.name: Converted Lead Contribution to Closed Opportunities %
presentationColumns.description: The ratio of Converted Closed Opportunities (created from Leads) in all the Closed Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: (#of Converted Closed Opportunities/# of Closed Opportunities)*100
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.Converted Lead Contribution to Closed Opportunities %

localization.localizationKey: Converted Lead Contribution to Closed Opportunities %

presentationColumns.name: Converted Lead Contribution to Lost Opportunities %
presentationColumns.description: The ratio of Converted Lost Opportunities (created from Leads) in all the Lost Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: (#of Converted Lost Opportunities/# of Lost Opportunities)*100
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Header.Converted Lead Contribution to Lost Opportunities %

localization.localizationKey: Converted Lead Contribution to Lost Opportunities %
